mapper.sql: id, wechat_id, nickname, telephone, head_photo, birthday, default_delivery_point, is_bind_phone, regiest_time, first_order_time, last_login_time, account_id, brand_id, sex, province, city, country, last_order_shop, new_notice_time, share_customer, is_now_register, customer_detail_id, bind_phone_time, bind_phone_shop, real_time_coupon_ids, subscribe, last_table_number, birthday_coupon_ids, share_coupon_ids,serial_number,share_link,card_id,code
mapper.select: select CONCAT_WS(',',(select count(1) from tb_customer),(select IFNULL(count(1),0) from tb_customer where is_bind_phone=1) ,(select IFNULL(count(1),0) from tb_customer where is_bind_phone=0),(select IFNULL(count(1),0) from tb_customer where sex=1) ,(select IFNULL(count(1),0) from tb_customer where sex=2),(select IFNULL(count(1),0) from tb_customer where sex=0)) count

select c.id customerId, a.id accountId, c.nickname, IFNULL(c.telephone,'--') telephone, c.head_photo photo, (if(ISNULL(tcd.birth_date),'--',DATE_FORMAT(tcd.birth_date,'%Y-%m-%d'))) birthday, if(c.is_bind_phone=1,'注册','未注册') isBindPhone, if((select count(1) from tb_charge_order tco where tco.customer_id = c.id) > 0,'是','否') isCharge, IF((c.province is null or c.province = ''),'--',c.province) province, IF((c.city is null or c.city = ''),'--',c.city) city, case when c.sex = 1 then '男' when c.sex = 2 then '女' else '未知' end sex, a.remain, IFNULL((select SUM(charge_balance) from tb_charge_order where order_state = 1 and customer_id = c.id),'0.00') chargeRemain, IFNULL((select SUM(reward_balance) from tb_charge_order where order_state = 1 and customer_id = c.id),'0.00') presentRemain, IFNULL((a.remain - (select SUM(charge_balance) from tb_charge_order where order_state = 1 and customer_id = c.id) -(select SUM(reward_balance) from tb_charge_order where order_state = 1 and customer_id = c.id)),'0.00') redRemain, IFNULL((select SUM(order_money) from tb_order where customer_id = c.id and order_state in (2,10,11,12) and production_status in (2,3)),'0.00') sumMoney, IFNULL((select count(1) from tb_order where customer_id = c.id and order_state in (2,10,11,12) and production_status in (2,3) and parent_order_id is null),'0') amount, IFNULL(ROUND(((select SUM(order_money) from tb_order where customer_id = c.id and order_state in (2,10,11,12) and production_status in (2,3))/ (select count(1) from tb_order where customer_id = c.id and order_state in (2,10,11,12) and production_status in (2,3) and parent_order_id is null) ),2),'0.00') money from tb_customer c left join tb_customer_detail tcd on c.customer_detail_id = tcd.id left join tb_account a on c.account_id = a.id where create_time >= #{beginDate} and #{endDate} >= create_time group by c.id;
